# Documentation

## API document generated by Doxygen

To create the HTML output, assuming the working directory is on `DbEntityService/Documentation/Main` where the `doxygen_config.txt` configuration file is, run the following command

```bash
doxygen doxygen_config.txt
```

Resulting files will be written to `doxygen_output/html` folder.  Then the full folder can be placed on a web server for easy browsing.

### Obtaining Doxygen

The software can be found on [this offical main site](http://www.doxygen.nl/index.html).  Just following the instructions to install the binary for Windows or Linux platform.

## Tutorial document generated by Mkdocs

To compile the markdown files into a coherent document site, run the command in the `Tutorial` folder where you can find the `mkdocs.yml` configuration file.

```bash
mkdocs build
```

The output will be written to the `site` folder.  The folder and the HTML files can be moved to a web server for easy browsing.

### Obtaining Mkdocs

The software can be obtained from [this offical main site](https://www.mkdocs.org/).

The theme used for generating the documents is [Mkdocs Material](https://github.com/squidfunk/mkdocs-material) and can be installed by

```bash
pip install mkdocs-material
```
